text: The Taking of Pelham 123 is a 2009 American crime thriller movie. It was directed by Tony Scott and stars Denzel Washington and John Travolta. It is based on the novel of the same name written by Morton Freedgood (writing under the pseudonym John Godey) and 1974 movie The Taking of Pelham One Two Three. It is set in New York City. == Other websites == * Category:2009 crime thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American movie remakes Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Heist movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Tony Scott Category:Movies set in New York City
title: The Taking of Pelham 123 (2009 movie)
